data.name: The Cosmos is MINE!
data.detailed_description:
Welcome Ambitious Space Prospector!

First off, thanks for checking out The Cosmos Is MINE! Set in an alternate 1950s universe, The Cosmos is MINE! is a multiplayer RTS where you control a galactic prospecting team in an interstellar resource war against other greedy space miners. With an engrossing two-method system to victory and amusing tongue-in-cheek setting of space-faring super-capitalism, get ready to make the cosmos yours!

As the game is in a very early stage of development, the Australian dev team at Playcorp is launching the game on Early Access with the full intent on using Early Access as it should be - to gain valuable user feedback and use suggestions from players. If you have suggestions for the game or would like to see the current roadmap, you can do so at their UserVoice page. To see how they'll be using your feedback, read this developer blog post.

It should be noted that the game is in an early stage of development with current features limited to focus on improving the fundamental gameplay experience:

1) Online play is a huge focus for the game and it is HIGHLY recommended that if you plan to play the game, to play online in multiplayer games with the Steam friends you recruit! :)

2) The single-player Solo Play mode should be used to get first time players acclimated to the basic game and camera controls. AI opponents are now available but they are aggressive and have no mercy.

3) After you finish playing an online game, if you should have problems connecting to players in a new online game, it’s recommended you restart the entire game.

4) There’s a good chance you’ll run into a bugs with an Early Access game – should you encounter a bug in The Cosmos is MINE! please post a report in our Steam Community Forums.

The development team wants to hear constructive criticism and great suggestions; for this purpose they have setup very effective feedback system through UserVoice. We strongly recommend visiting The Cosmos is MINE! UserVoice page to be involved with frequent voting of newly introduces ideas and features for the game!


About the Game

TRANSORBITAL PROVISIONAL MINING LICENSE GRANTED

Congratulations, Prospector! As a fully licensed TransOrbital space miner, we are excited to have you aboard in the hunt for the most valuable resource in the cosmos – Animus! Everything is powered by Animus, and without it all of our advanced technology would cease to function; space vehicles, robots, and even your Insta-Suck laundry machines!

From today you'll be contributing to a better future for all of humankind and, more importantly, the growth of TransOrbital stock price!

As per your contract agreement, you and your crew will be sent all over the galaxy to mine Animus-positive planets. At TransOrbital the demand for Animus is so great that our corporation has daily supply targets that need to be achieved. So, in accordance with your TransOrbital Mining Agreement, we expect you and your other competing mining outfits to meet your hourly quota without fail. Breach of contract will result in immediate orbital removal and a loss of your prospector license. Meet your quotas however and you’ll be handsomely rewarded with TransOrbital stock options which are Guaranteed™ to skyrocket in value!*

So valued Prospector, be sure to explore the entire planet, expand your zoning permits, and do whatever is necessary to mine as much Animus as you can!

As we can’t guarantee your operational safety, be prepared to defend your area against the aggressive tactics of competing contractors. We’ve tried our best to establish memorandums of understanding to ensure a level playing field however we are not accountable for the actions of fellow sub-contractors. Hey, it’s a dog-eat-dog universe out there on the galactic fringe, but if you can outlast and overtake the competition, the cosmos will be yours!


Tools At Your Disposal:
  • Immersive Universe – Explore the landscapes of planets on the galactic fringe with advanced technology straight out of the 50s'
  • Spherical, Hex-Grid Worlds – Fully 3D worlds with all the mechanical precision of the hex grid
  • Tactically Focused Gameplay – Simple to control, quick matches designed for anyone to be able to pick up and play
  • Detailed Worlds – See the planet change as you mine resources from the world
  • Stylized Upgradeable Units – Four core units can be customized with different abilities and perks through tech tree upgrades
  • Team-based Competitive Gameplay – PVP multiplayer focused on team play
  • Hyper Detailed Zoom – Watch the quirky actions of your units right up close.

*The TransOrbital Guarantee is a registered trademark and bears no resemblance to any existing definition, implied or explicit. TransOrbital stock options will not be fully vested until 4th quarter quotas have been achieved. Stock options are non-transferrable, not redeemable for cash or legal tender and can only be vested by a single party per planet or cosmic body once the initial term has completed. Please refer to TransOrbital Prospector's Guide to Animus Hunting on the Galactic Fringe, section 867.53 – 09.

data.short_description: In The Cosmos is MINE!, you are a space prospector competing with other players to take over planets on the fringes of the galaxy. Mine Animus, the most valuable resource in the universe, and protect your territories from very hostile takeovers!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 9 capable video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3Ghz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB Direct3D 9 capable video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
